metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39210 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: GLPI is a free Asset and IT management software package. In versions priorto 9.5.6, the cookie used to store the autologin cookie (when a user usesthe "remember me" feature) is accessible by scripts. A malicious pluginthat could steal this cookie would be able to use it to autologin. Thisissue is fixed in version 9.5.6. As a workaround, one may avoid using the"remember me" feature.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
